title: With Karen Wong of The Meaning Code: Christian Conscience and Our Broken, Unjust Food System
description:
Karen Wong is the hostess of The Meaning Code Channel and a wonderful conversation partner as can be seen by her many interesting guests. With her deep Christian faith and background in state government she was a great person to give added perspective to this topic. 

Karen Wong's channel, The Meaning Code: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgp_r6WlBwDSJrP43Mz07GQ

My previous conversation with Karen, Paul Vanderklay & John Vervaeke, God's generosity and the Rest of the Story, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M34dOKfxA2g

My  conversation with Karen and Shari, Meaning Crisis or Crisis of Hope? Agapic Love, Randos and A Grief Observed: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WaElJVQqT0M
